name: FOOT-BALL
description: This game was made in about 2.2 days and it completely destroyed my sanity. All jokes aside I really did enjoy making this, and honestly I learned more in the past 2 days than I ever had in school or working on any other project. I just wish I knew how painful it would be trying to make my first 3D game during a 3 day game jam. Despite the game saying it's released, it isn't really close to being done as I had no time to finish. Level 2 and 3 aren't able to be played, because if I made them I would've had to submit this project 2 days over the deadline. Anyways hope you enjoy!
